tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE digital_asset_ownership (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_id INT,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    token_amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    token_type ENUM('fungible', 'non-fungible'),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE asset_ownership (
    ownership_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    owner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100),
    ownership_status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Active',
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (asset_id) REFERENCES digital_assets(asset_id)
);

CREATE TABLE digital_asset_owners (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE digital_asset_metadata (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE asset_transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE digital_assets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    owner_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    token_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE asset_transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT NOT NULL,
    buyer_id INT NOT NULL,
    seller_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE digital_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(100),
    owner_id INT REFERENCES owners(owner_id),
    token_id VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT REFERENCES digital_assets(asset_id),
    sender_id INT REFERENCES owners(owner_id),
    receiver_id INT REFERENCES owners(owner_id),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL
);
